headline: receptionist/administrative support
pros: a company that treats their employees with consideration and fairness.  They strive to give yearly bonuses, and holiday gifts.
cons: they did sell off the retail portion of the company, retaining the investment banking portion.  limits their business reach and number of employees.

headline: Broker
pros: Good company to work for.  Many offerings to show clients, but they were not forced on you.
cons: Small company, didn't have a lot of sponsorship for many of their deals on the street.  Deals usually struggled initially.
